subject: Example audio files
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
I've added the following example audio files to my website.

Example Audio Files at http://www.ufomagazine.net
12-469 sweeping AM
12-469 sweeping FM
12-470 sweeping AM
12-470 sweeping FM
12-470 sweeping TV
Spiricomp sweeping AM
Spiricomp sweeping FM
Spiricomp sweeping AM/FM

Before each example plays I tell you know exactly what Radio Shack 
Hack model you are listening to, and in what mode.
These might be helpful for those trying to decide which system to 
work with.

The file links are located in the right-hand-column, just under the 
photos of the various Radio Shack Hack devices.

Thanks...
- Mike (UFO Geek)
http://www.ufomagazine.net
